SKYLITE

Bringing you the current weather using the OpenWeather API

How it Works

Type a location into the search bar, then click on the search button. Skylite will then display the current weather for that location from the data provided by the OpenWeather API.

Search terms may include locations worldwide, including continents, countries, states, provinces, or cities. Please note that postal codes, addresses, and GPS coordinates are not supported.

The OpenWeather API is a service that provides access to up-to-date weather information for locations worldwide. It offers a range of data including temperature, humidity, wind speed, precipitation, etc., which are displayed in the daily forecast provided to you in Skylite.
